mapper.sql: b.id as id, b.user_id as userId, b.basicinformation_id as basicinformationId, b.payment_id as paymentId, b.bft_name as bftName, b.bft_size as bftSize, b.bid_money as bidMoney, b.bid_freight as bidFreight, b.bid_bond as bidBond, b.lately_bid as latelyBid, b.term_validity as termValidity, b.status as status, b.type as `type`, b.sign as sign, b.bid_date as bidDate, b.invalid_date as invalidDate
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT bi.id,bi.basicinformation_id,bi.bft_name,bi.bft_size,bi.bid_bond,bi.bid_date,bi.bid_money,bf.brand,bf.`name` as bname,bf.smallImgUrl as bsmallImgUrl,bf.type as btype,bf.artNo as bartNo FROM bid bi LEFT JOIN basicinformation bf ON bi.basicinformation_id = bf.id ORDER BY bi.bid_date DESC) as bid GROUP BY basicinformation_id
